entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
